extendedInfo.description: La Liga Explorer is a mobile news portal where you can find your favorite Spanish football teams, league table, league schedule or Live scores. You will also find a football betting odds, articles, tweets or videos in seconds from a variety of trusted sources. Enjoy the fast and easy way to navigate the Spanish football leagues with our Explorer, completely free. We support the Primera Division (Liga BBVA), Segunda Division and Champions League.NEWWe have added FREE Notifications - GOAL alerts for your favourite team (since ver.2.0)Content:>> All Spanish football La Liga clubs>> Primera Divison / Segunda Division / Champions League  schedule - Simply add a selected event into your calendar>> Live Scores & League table, Real-time Live Scores, including goal-scorers or yellow cards. (League table is updated once per 24 hours)>> Notifications - Real Goal alerts for your favourite team. (Go to Settings / Notifications Goal Alerts)>> Results history - We keep track of all previous Spanish La Liga results for the season 2011/12>> Odds comparison - Information about betting odds and Visual odds Power graph for all punters>> Fan Photo / Video Gallery - Share your best moments with other fans and win football jersey for the best shot>> The most recent articles, tweets and videos>> Fast processing, simple to use and mobile friendly design>> We keep special content in Spanish or English language- No affiliation with any 3rd party content inside this app- No hidden costs or charges- Only commercial element in this app is AD banner served from time to time by AdMob network.We look forward to hearing your feedback about our La Liga  Android app!Please contact us at support@sportexplorer.mobiEnjoy our app!Best Regards,developers247

reviews.title: LOVE IT_!! AMOR!!!
reviews.comment: This app Is genuinely great and awesome because it provides you with the table results/positions of all the team in laliga, championsleague and for few more titles!! What else can someone ask for!! It\'s all in one...and I really THANK the producer of this app. Without this I will have had to download many apps for every league fixture..but since this app. Is all in one, it really saves my memory storage plus it itself doesn\'t take much space!! LOVE IT!! #HALAMADRID :D
